Screenwriter: Lowell Ganz, Babaloo Mandel, Billy Crystal
Distributor: Columbia Pictures, New Line Cinema, Image Entertainment Inc.
Production Co: Castle Rock Entertainment, Face Productions, New Line Cinema
Synopsis: Given his success in the early days of television, you'd think that Buddy Young Jr. (Billy Crystal) would be coasting happily into retirement alongside his wife, Elaine (Julie Warner). Instead, Buddy is an acerbic blowhard who alienates his brother, Stan (David Paymer), and everyone else who fails to bow to his bullying. His agent, Annie Wells (Helen Hunt), has positioned elderly Buddy for a big movie role, but his irreverence might come back to bite him one last time.
Title: Mr. Saturday Night
